metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8377 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
SQL injection vulnerability in the host_new_graphs_save function in graphs_new.php in Cacti 0.8.8f and earlier allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary SQL commands via crafted serialized data in the selected_graphs_array parameter in a save action.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8377` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 0.8.8f+ds1-4ubuntu4.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.8.8f+ds1-4ubuntu4.16.04.1').
